arts.ttl: Bournemouth move second with comfortable win over Dyche's Forest
arts.sum: Bournemouth moved up to second in the Premier League with a comfortable 2-0 victory in Sean Dyche’s first league game in charge of Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Premier League LIVE: Scores including Arsenal vs Crystal Palace & Aston Villa vs Man City
arts.sum: Follow build-up to five Premier League matches, Bournemouth v Nottingham Forest, Arsenal v Crystal Palace, Aston Villa v Man City, Wolves v Burnley, Everton v Tottenham, with live text updates and reaction.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Nottingham Forest – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bournemouth return to the Vitality Stadium on Sunday, aiming to extend their impressive seven-match unbeaten run in the Premier League. Andoni Iraola’s side have made their best-ever start to a top-flight campaign. Consequently, they should be confident of securing another victory. They face a Nottingham Forest side currently struggling for form. Furthermore, the Cherries have […] The post Bournemouth vs Nottingham Forest – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest XI vs Bournemouth – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: A new era begins in the Premier League for Nottingham Forest on Sunday as Sean Dyche takes charge of his first league match away at high-flying Bournemouth. The former Burnley boss oversaw a morale-boosting Europa League victory against Porto in midweek. arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs. Nottingham Forest injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of the latest injury and suspension news ahead of Sunday's Premier League clash between Bournemouth and Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Iraola provides Brooks, Evanilson updates ahead of Forest clash
arts.sum: Bournemouth head coach Andoni Iraola provides an injury update on David Brooks and Evanilson ahead of Sunday's Premier League clash with Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Nottingham Forest predictions: Semenyo to bring Dyche back to earth
arts.sum: Sean Dyche has made the winning start Forest fans craved but Steve Davies fancies normal service will be resumed at Bournemouth.
